body: This isnt ntr! They are not a couple or going out yet, I think those translator group gotta go for a class to learn what mean NTR, BTW this is great too, Im a person who don't like NTR.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me.
